nio/YouTubeChannel.description: Create a signal for each new video post, given a channel ID. When you view the source code of a channel page on YouTube, the channel ID is found by searching for 'channelId'.

include_query.title: Include Query Field
include_query.description: Whether to include queries in request to facebook.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request to Facebook.

lookback.title: Lookback Period
lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: How often Youtube is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the *polling interval* times the number of queries.

queries.title: Query Strings
queries.description: Queries to include on request to Youtube

retry_interval.title: Retry Interval
retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.title: Retry Limit
retry_limit.description: Number of times to retry on a poll.

default.description: Creates a new signal for each Video. Every field on the Video will become a signal attribute.

exclude.title: Terms to Exclude
exclude.description: List of terms to exclude from results.
